pages.title: The Basics
pages.text: This one is very simple. You will not be given any Age of Exile loot or exp when killing mobs spawned by spawners. Vanilla loot is still given by default.

pages.title: More info
pages.text: In return, spawners now drop Age of Exile loot, so breaking them should be rewarding and your priority should be to always take down the spawners first.
